articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson, CNN
articles.title: Deadpool 3 is coming -- and it's going to be part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe
articles.description: A third "Deadpool" film is happening -- and it will be part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

articles.title: Family struck by Covid-19 holds funeral in parking lot
articles.description: CNN's Sara Sidner talks to a grieving California family forced to have a funeral service for their loved one who died of coronavirus in a parking lot, as funeral homes and local hospitals continue to be overwhelmed with the Covid-19 surge.

articles.author: Fredreka Schouten, CNN
articles.title: 'Extraordinary' corporate revolt over campaign donations shakes political world
articles.description: Some of the country's largest firms are scrambling to distance themselves from last week's insurrection at the US Capitol by freezing or reassessing their political donations -- sending tremors through a political system that has relied for decades on the pre…

articles.author: Hollie Silverman, Jamiel Lynch and Leah Asmelash, CNN
articles.title: John Reilly, actor known for 'General Hospital,' has died
articles.description: John Reilly, a longtime soap opera actor known for his time on "General Hospital," died on Saturday, his daughter confirmed to CNN. He was 86.

articles.title: Legendary journalist Sam Donaldson discusses the state of US democracy
articles.description: CNN's Anderson Cooper talks to legendary journalist Sam Donaldson about Democrats' impeachment plans, the 25th amendment and the state of US democracy. Watch Full Circle Monday, Thursday, and Friday this week at 6p E.T.

articles.author: Alexis Benveniste, CNN Business
articles.title: GoFundMe is banning fundraising for travel expenses used for potentially violent political events
articles.description: GoFundMe will no longer allow people to fundraise for travel expenses used for potentially violent political events after pro-Trump protesters used the platform to rake in cash ahead of storming the US Capitol.

articles.title: Anderson talks about how he learned to accept being gay
articles.description: CNN's Anderson Cooper answers a viewer's question about how he learned to accept being gay. Anderson Cooper Full Circle airs Monday, Thursday and Friday this week at 6p E.T.

articles.author: Christina Zdanowicz, CNN
articles.title: Theodore Lumpkin Jr., a Tuskegee Airmen member, dies at 100 due to Covid-19 complications
articles.description: Theodore Lumpkin Jr., one of the last surviving members of the famed Tuskegee Airmen who served during World War II, has died at age 100.

articles.author: Nicquel Terry Ellis, CNN
articles.title: Yogananda Pittman named acting US Capitol police chief after riots
articles.description: The US Capitol Police has appointed a Black woman as its acting police chief after the former head resigned in the fallout from the agency's inadequate response to pro-Trump rioters who staged an insurrection at the Capitol last week.

articles.title: Members of the public mistakenly allowed to sign up for Covid-19 vaccination appointments in Kentucky
articles.description: Members of the general public in Kentucky were mistakenly allowed to sign up for Covid-19 vaccine appointments meant for health care workers, according to Louisville-based health system Baptist Health.

articles.title: Doctors test popular anti-depressant to see if it fights off Covid-19
articles.description: Doctors are running a clinical trial to see if a popular anti-depressant might keep someone from becoming severely ill with Covid-19.

articles.author: Jacob Krol
articles.title: Sony's 2021 TVs are here and we spoke to the man behind them

articles.author: Matt McFarland, CNN Business
articles.title: Airbnb says it will try to ban Capitol rioters from inauguration stays
articles.description: Airbnb announced on Monday plans to attempt to restrict rioters who stormed the Capitol from returning to the Washington, DC area for next week's presidential inauguration.

articles.title: Rioters seen beating officer minutes after Trump's 'go home' video
articles.description: The FBI has received information indicating "armed protests" are being planned at all 50 state capitols and the US Capitol in Washington, DC, in the days leading up to President-elect Joe Biden's inauguration, according to an internal bulletin obtained by CNN.

articles.title: This tech gives drivers directions on the road in front of them - CNN
articles.description: At the all-virtual CES 2021, Panasonic debuted its augmented reality HUD that aims to help drivers navigate and park.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Democrats delaying impeachment is totally nonsensical
articles.description: House Democrats want you to believe these two things -- at the same time:
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.title: Congressman harassed at DC area airport
articles.description: Democratic Rep. Lou Correa of California was flying home from Dulles International Airport, when he was confronted by a group of what appeared to be Trump supporters.

articles.author: Cheri Mossburg and Leah Asmelash, CNN
articles.title: First known cases of Covid-19 among great apes discovered at US zoo
articles.description: The surge of Covid-19 in California has just gotten even worse, after at least two gorillas at the San Diego Zoo became infected with Covid-19, the zoo and Gov. Gavin Newsom said Monday.

articles.title: Bash on Wolf resignation: Quitting is the easy way out
articles.description: Acting Secretary of Homeland Security Chad Wolf is resigning, he said in a letter to the department that was obtained by CNN. CNN's Gloria Borger and Dana Bash discuss with Wolf Blitzer.

articles.author: Bianna Golodryga and Meridith Edwards, CNN
articles.title: How Miami-Dade opened all its public schools -- and kept them open
articles.description: Superintendent Alberto Carvalho believes there is no substitute for in-person learning, and he says he's been able to open the nation's fourth largest school district with confidence.

articles.title: READ: Acting Homeland Security Secretary Chad Wolf's resignation letter
articles.description: Chad Wolf resigned Monday as acting secretary of Homeland Security. Here is his resignation letter, obtained by CNN.

articles.title: Facebook bans 'stop the steal' content, 69 days after election
articles.description: Facebook will begin removing all content that mentions the phrase "stop the steal," a full 69 days after Election Day.

articles.author: Annie Grayer and Ryan Nobles, CNN
articles.title: 2 Capitol Police officers suspended and another individual arrested for their alleged roles in riot
articles.description: Two Capitol Police officers have been suspended and another individual has been arrested for their alleged roles in the riot at the US Capitol on January 6, said Rep. Tim Ryan.
